articles.title: America First Policy Institute, a group advising Trump, says its systems were breached - The Associated Press
articles.description: The America First Policy Institute says “hostile foreign actors” breached its systems. AFPI is a group helping to lay the groundwork for a future Donald Trump administration. It says it discovered the breach last week but would not disclose what materials wer…
articles.content: A group helping to lay the groundwork for a future Donald Trump administration said its computer systems were breached, marking the second known instance that people supporting the former president h… [+1520 chars]

articles.title: 7-Eleven is closing more than 400 locations in North America - ABC7 Los Angeles
articles.description: Several hundred "underperforming" 7-Eleven locations across North America are closing, the convenience store announced.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- Several hundred "underperforming" 7-Eleven locations across North America are closing, the convenience store announced.
